body.name: LED Floor Lamps for Living Room,Standing Lamp with Remote Push Button and Adjustable Gooseneck,Bright Dimmable,Custom Color Temperature Reading Lamp for Bedroom Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 28 mins
features: Upgrade Your Lighting Experience: Our modern floor lamp is designed to provide bright, non-dazzling lighting that's easy on the eyes. With a newly upgraded metal base and lamp head, you can enjoy a sturdy and balanced lamp that won't feel top-heavy on low pile carpets or hard floors.

Control Your Lighting with Ease: Our reading light floor lamp comes with two types of control - a 50ft distance remote control and sensitive button control. The intelligent inner build-in components of the lamp make it easy to control and the magnetic remote attracts iron firmly and won't drop.

Customize Your Lighting: With 5%-100% stepless dimmable brightness and 4 color temperatures (3000K-6500K), you can customize your lighting to suit your mood and preferences. Click the button to change the color (white, cold white, warm white, warm) and enjoy the perfect lighting for your space.

Set Your Timer: Our living room lamp has a timing function of 30 minutes and one hour, so you can set the time to turn on or off according to your needs. This feature is perfect for those who want to save energy and reduce their electricity bills.

Save Money and Energy: Our adjustable gooseneck allows you to rotate the flexible floor lamp head to any direction and angle, fixed to any position you like. With a light life of up to 100,000 hours, you can reduce the cost of maintenance and replacement, and save money and energy in the long run.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Bright Dimmable LED Floor Lamp With high brightness and low heat LED advanced technology, the long durable LED energy-saving bulb of this tall lamps for living room is great to save your electrical bill. The industrial floor lamp with remote can provide a cozy ambiance for nights and add new textures to your living space.

Color Rendering Index (CRI) of over 80 This standing lamps for living room can warm up your room, care about your eyes. Super bright and flicker-free light brights up whole room without directing into eyes and minimizes eye fatigue. The soft anti-glare light from the reading lamp allow you immersing into your world.

Customize Your Lighting Mode This sofa lamp allows to customize your favorable colors by choosing different colors temperatures (warm light, neutral light, cool light) from 3000K to 6500K and adjust the stepless dimmable brightness from 10%-100% or 10 brightness level options.

Stand Lamp Design Is Dexterous And Easy To Place And Move Stand lamp is suitable for very many scenes: bright white light illuminates the living room for leisure and play, warm light bedroom for bedtime reading, bedtime stories for children, etc., to create a warm parent-child time. 49FT (15m) remote control and button control in two ways, suitable for home theater, mother night to feed the baby, the toilet at night and all the moments in the dark is not convenient to walk.

Gooseneck Floor Lamp with Remote & Touch Control The flexible black gooseneck design can be rotated 360 degrees, which a wider range of lighting. The floor lamp has a memory function, modern lamp is perfect for your different illumination needs of bedroom, living room, office, study, art room, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light, great price
reviews.reviewText: Best lamp you can ever own! So many different light functions and settings for every mood. Love the night light feature for when you want to see the entry way but not to wake anyone in your house. Also love the 30 min and 1 hour timer. Remote control comes in handy when entering your house at night. Easily turn on light to see when coming through the front door. Definitely recommend. We already want to buy a few more for the entire house. Just wish it came in other metal colors like nickel or brush chrome. Only had the flat black, but we got it on sale at $26. So it was a steal! Don’t hesitate. Just buy it. You won’t regret it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great lamp!
reviews.reviewText: Works well! Lovely soft, pleasant light quality. The light temperature (warm and cool) and brightness are adjustable with the nice little remote. There is also a switch on the lamp. The remote is magnetic so you can stick it to the base or stem to keep track of it. This lamp works as a counter light as well as a floor lamp. It has a small base so it doesn't take up much room if you need place it on a kitchen counter. My only concern is how long the LED light will last. We shall see...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, adjustble color is appreciated.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for a bedside reading light, replacing a very expensive but ancient Kovacs floor lamp. It is plenty bright and being able to adjust the hue (locally or via remote) was fabulous. All for about the price of a LED replacement bulb on the Kovacs.Do follow the instructions and assemble the pole from the bottom up! This prevents cord twists inside the pole and needing to re-tighten the sections during assembly (yes, as a guy I didn't read the instructions first).The only other issue is the symmetrical base makes it hard to place next to a wall. Fortunately I was able to switch to the old Kovacs base as all of the hardware on this lamp uses standard lamp part sizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't look like you can replace the light when it goes out so I might have to buy a different lamp once this one's light dies. Other than that disappointment the lamp is great and the different colors you can change it to is wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Bought this floor lamp for night reading. Love the different shades of ligh. The gooseneck design gives it a sleek yet sturdy look. The remote control offers great convenience. I can set it to turn off and on at one hour or 30 minute intervals. All without having to leave my chair or bed. For the price, it's a great investment. Product came ahead of scheduled date. Neatly and securely packaged. Easy set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great. But not as bright as promissed.
reviews.reviewText: It's great. But not as bright as promissed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really like how this lamp is very portable. It has many settings for brightness and color. One of the best features for which I bought it was the flex neck so I can put it close to my coloring page. It also comes with a remote. It was worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i have a log home which can be very dark at times. I purchased 2 of these floor lamps and use them daily. i have one over my work area and one in the corner of the den. I love that they come with remote controls and that you can change the brightness levels. Great product!
